channel.title: Evil King . Stand Proud Already
channel.description:
I see this a few times and it bugs me .
The game is down to about 5-6 players and not many unseen or cult have died . Your likely looking at at least 3 unseen .
And the evil king is still playing out like he is a good guy .
As the unseen you obv aren't sure because the king has been cagey and you cant risk revealing to king encase he isn't your guy .
then a few turns later the prince has axed a few guys etc. and the game has swung back to Blue dragon .
Just feel sometimes that an Evil King needs to step up once in a while when the odds are likely that you are ahead .

item.title: Evil King . Stand Proud Already
item.dc:creator: Floofyboy
item.description:
Now that noble got nerfed to the ground, u can simply whisper the unseen you found out and thats it.

Read full topic

item.title: Evil King . Stand Proud Already
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
IF you are fairly certain there are three unseen, then it is time to out at 7 total players (including yourself), so long as you can either execute the prince that day or the prince is dead.

Read full topic

item.title: Evil King . Stand Proud Already
item.dc:creator: Zeprido
item.description:
I’m not really sure how or when to do that. I mean, if its obvious and I’m MM/Assassin I’ll go out on a limb and whisper king. On a semi-related note, my 2 Reaper wins have been because I whispered Neut king that I was his only ally and he voted with me both times.

Read full topic
